scripts.git:develop: git checkout develop; git add .; git commit --allow-empty; git push origin develop;
scripts.git:qa: git checkout qa; git merge develop --no-edit; git commit --allow-empty -m 'semver:patch'; git push origin qa; git checkout develop;
scripts.git:staging: git checkout staging; git merge qa; git push origin staging; git checkout develop;
scripts.git:production: git checkout master; git merge staging; git push origin master; git checkout develop;
scripts.eb-deploy:local: NODE_ENV=development; git add . ; git commit -m "eb-deploy:local" --allow-empty; eb local run --envvars AWS_NODE_ENV=production
scripts.eb-deploy:develop: NODE_ENV=development; git add . ; git commit -m "eb-deploy:develop" --allow-empty; eb deploy develop-ner-mt-clevere-st --profile $npm_package_config_aws_profile --timeout 15
scripts.eb-deploy:qa: NODE_ENV=qa; git add . ; git commit -m "eb-deploy:qa" --allow-empty; eb deploy qa-ner-mt-clevere-st --profile $npm_package_config_aws_profile --timeout 15
scripts.eb-deploy:staging: NODE_ENV=staging; git add . ; git commit -m "eb-deploy:staging" --allow-empty; eb deploy staging-ner-mt-clevere-st --profile $npm_package_config_aws_profile --timeout 15
scripts.eb-deploy:production: NODE_ENV=production; git add . ; git commit -m "eb-deploy:production" --allow-empty; eb deploy prod-ner-mt-clevere-st --profile $npm_package_config_aws_profile --timeout 15
